column5: While at Lost Island Lodge this summer besides walleye fishing we would like to do some Smallmouth fishing. Does anyone have any advice on where to start looking? And what possible depths a guy should try. Will they be shallow in the mornings and evenings? And has anyone had any luck on Smallies in the Hudson Area, or is it even worth trying? Thanks, Big Joe

Try cranks/rattle traps off the south shore from the boat ramp heading east until just before you hit the weedy cove area. troll the whole shore and carpet bomb away. Key in on the rocky areas. There can be pockets of smallies there.
